snippet: The authorities are investigating whether a triple homicide last week was committed as part of a ritualistic ceremony in connection with the recent blue moon.
abstract: Authorities in Florida are examining whether murders of Voncile Smith and her sons Richard and John in Pensacola area were part of ritualistic ceremony related to blue moon.
lead_paragraph: The authorities are investigating whether a triple homicide last week was committed as part of a ritualistic ceremony in connection with the recent blue moon.

headline.main: Florida: Sheriff Says 3 Killings May Be Connected to Blue Moon
headline.print_headline: Florida: Sheriff Says 3 Killings May Be Connected to Blue Moon
